mapper.select: select exhibition_idx , exhibition_title , exhibition_start , exhibition_end , exhibition_region , exhibition_location , exhibition_img , exhibition_contents , exhibition_url , exhibition_category , exhibition_registDate , exhibition_hits from exhibition_board

select exhibition_idx , exhibition_title , exhibition_registDate , exhibition_writer , exhibition_category , exhibition_url , exhibition_start , exhibition_end , exhibition_region , exhibition_location , exhibition_contents , exhibition_hits , exhibition_img from exhibition_board where exhibition_idx = #{exhibition_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into exhibition_board(exhibition_category, exhibition_title, exhibition_url, exhibition_start, exhibition_end, exhibition_region, exhibition_location, exhibition_contents, exhibition_img) values(#{exhibition_category}, #{exhibition_title}, #{exhibition_url}, #{exhibition_start}, #{exhibition_end}, #{exhibition_region}, #{exhibition_location}, #{exhibition_contents}, #{exhibition_img})
mapper.select: select exhibition_idx , exhibition_title , exhibition_writer , exhibition_img , exhibition_registDate , exhibition_start , exhibition_end , exhibition_hits from exhibition_board order by exhibition_idx DESC limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select exhibition_idx , exhibition_category , exhibition_title , exhibition_contents , exhibition_registDate , exhibition_hits , exhibition_start , exhibition_end , exhibition_img , exhibition_status from exhibition_board
where exhibition_category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{category}, '%') and exhibition_status LIKE CONCAT('%', #{status}, '%')
and exhibition_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
and exhibition_writer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
and exhibition_contents LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by exhibition_idx DESC limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select count(exhibition_idx) from exhibition_board where exhibition_category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{category}, '%')and exhibition_status LIKE CONCAT('%', #{status}, '%')
and exhibition_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
and exhibition_contents LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
and exhibition_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') or exhibition_contents LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
